summary: Implement wallet feature front-end elements and required back-end integrations, starting with the Wallet Overview page, then Wallet Summary, Transactions table, Events feed, and organization-filtered wallet queries.
architectural_notes: Implement wallet UI elements in dependency order: Overview -> Summary -> Transactions -> Events -> Org-scoped wiring (activeOrganizationId).

existing_features.title: Add a new Wallet Overview Page in the frontend that displays organization-scoped wallet overview data for the currently active organization from OrganizationContext. The page must load its data via React Query hooks calling the backend APIs from REQ-1 and render clear loading, empty, and error states.

Wire navigation/routing to access the new Wallet Overview Page from the existing app routing (tanstack router) and ensure the active organization selection (OrganizationSwitcher/OrganizationContext) controls which organizationâ€™s wallets are shown on the Wallet Overview Page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement Wallet Overview page and wire to backend calls (getWallet, listWallets, getWalletOverviewResponse).
Implement Wallet Summary page and wire to backend call getWalletSummary.
Implement Wallet Transaction Table UI and wire to backend call listWalletTransactions.
Implement Wallet Events Feed UI and wire to backend call listWalletEvents.
Wire organization-filtered wallet queries by passing activeOrganizationId from UI to existing backend functions.

Implement the backend wallet read APIs needed for the Wallet Overview experience: (1) listWallets scoped to an organization, (2) getWallet by walletId (and organization authorization), and (3) getWalletOverviewResponse that returns per-wallet overview metrics for the selected organization. Enforce authorization so organization members can only access wallets for organizations they belong to, while global admins may access any organization.

projectName: Step 1: Implement Wallet Overview (backend APIs + frontend page)
